subject: CNN Alerts: bush

CNN Alerts: bush






 



Alert Name: bush
Michael Moore on hot seat for film's Cuba trip

05/10/07 08:36 AM, EDT
Academy Award-winning filmmaker Michael Moore is under investigation by the U.S. Treasury Department for taking ailing September 11 rescue workers to Cuba for a segment in his upcoming health-care documentary "Sicko," The Associated Press has learned.
FULL STORY
